full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP) for Data Quality Management & Collibra Configuration Services

## Solicitation Details
| Field Name | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number **(numeroSollicitation)** | 001562 |
| Publication Date **(datePublication)** | September 30, 2022 |
| Tender Closing Date **(appelOffresDateCloture)** | October 21, 2022, 2:00 pm EDT |
| Tender Status **(appelOffresStatut)** | Expired |
| Procurement Method **(methodeApprovisionnement)** | Competitive – Open Bidding |
| Procurement Category **(categorieApprovisionnement)** | SRV (Services) |
| Trade Agreements **(accordsCommerciaux)** | Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) |
| Regions of Opportunity **(regionAppelOffres)** | Canada |
| Regions of Delivery **(regionsLivraison)** | Ontario (except NCR) |

## Contracting Entity Information
| Field Name | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Contracting Entity Name **(nomEntitContractante)** | Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation |
| Contracting Entity Address | 700 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0P7, Canada |

## Proposal Submission
The Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) invites prospective proponents to submit proposals for delivering Data Quality Management & Collibra Configuration Services. The proposed services should conform to the specifications outlined in the RFP document (Appendix C).

The CMHC intends to enter into a non-exclusive agreement with the successful proponent for a period of one (1) year, with an option to extend the agreement by an additional two (2) years. Suppliers must download the solicitation document and attachments directly from the tender page.

## Important Dates
- **Publication Date**: September 30, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: October 21, 2022, 2:00 pm EDT
- **Term of Agreement**: November 2022 to November 2023 (with an option to extend for up to two additional years)

## Additional Information
- **Notice URL**: Not Applicable
- **Attachments**: Data Quality Operating Model and Collibra Configuration Services (PDF)

For further details, interested proponents can download the RFP document and attachments from the Government of Canada procurement website [canadabuys.canada.ca](https://
